title: Essay writing made easy
creator_credit: Peter Lane, Ruth Lee, Dennis Famigia and Deakin University
brief_description: James Valentine takes the viewer through the six stages of essay writing: analysing the question; researching; planning; writing; and editing & presentation. Each stage is clearly presented with practical advice from both academics and students. Study guide included.
creator_credit_for_label: Peter Lane, Ruth Lee, Dennis Famigia and Deakin University
